name: Network Security
description: Mission Defense Team hardening reps for space weapon system networks.

cards.title: RMF Control Burn-Down
cards.description: Prioritize POA&M items by mapping each open control to mission impact, weapon system baseline, and AFI 17-101 suspense. Ref: DoDI 8510.01.
cards.summaryText: RMF is a combat support task when it drives mission availability.

cards.title: STIG Automation Rehearsal
cards.description: Run security content automation protocol (SCAP) scans, interpret deltas, and document compensating controls for space ground segments. Ref: AFMAN 17-1301.
cards.summaryText: STIGs only matter if Guardians can execute and explain them fast.

cards.title: Boundary Protection Stack
cards.description: Validate firewall ACLs, IPS signatures, and cross-domain guard rules against the current Space Tasking Order. Ref: AFI 17-206.
cards.summaryText: A layered boundary is the first MDT talking point every shift.

cards.title: Mission Thread Mapping
cards.description: Trace critical cyber terrain from antenna to data endpoint so defenders know exactly where to instrument sensors. Ref: SDP 3-0.
cards.summaryText: If you can't draw the mission thread, you can't defend it.

cards.title: Privileged Access Review
cards.description: Audit admin accounts, MFA logs, and service credentials per AFMAN 17-1302-O to prevent lateral movement. Ref: AFI 17-701.
cards.summaryText: Privileged access sprawl kills Zero-Trust efforts—keep it tight.

cards.title: Patch Management Warboard
cards.description: Compare vendor bulletins, IAVMs, and waiver statuses to plan patch installs without breaking mission availability. Ref: CJCSM 6510.01B.
cards.summaryText: Patch timelines must match launch manifests and contact windows.

cards.title: Logging & SIEM Health Check
cards.description: Confirm syslog coverage, time sync, and correlation rules so hunt teams have clean data. Ref: DoDI 8500.01.
cards.summaryText: Bad logs equal blind MDTs—keep the data trustworthy.

cards.title: Supply Chain Assurance
cards.description: Inspect HBSS/ESS baselines, firmware provenance, and SBOM records per DoDI 5200.44 to mitigate tampered hardware. Ref: AFDP 3-14.
cards.summaryText: Space systems ride unique supply chains; verify every component.

cards.title: SCIF Cross-Domain Safeguards
cards.description: Validate Cross Domain Solution guard queues, releasability rules, and auditing for ISR data flows. Ref: CNSSI 1253.
cards.summaryText: Cross-domain errors can halt joint ops—treat them like mission critical gear.

cards.title: OT Segmentation Drill
cards.description: Ensure antenna pedestals, UPS, and HVAC controls stay segmented with correctly configured ACLs and monitoring. Ref: DoDI 8500.01.
cards.summaryText: Operational tech is mission equipment; defend it like avionics.

cards.title: Encryption Posture Review
cards.description: Verify TLS versions, IPsec tunnels, and crypto device key loads align with CNSSP-15 guidance. Ref: AFI 17-130.
cards.summaryText: Crypto currency isn't financial—it's mission assurance.

cards.title: Configuration Baseline Audit
cards.description: Compare current configs to the secure baseline repository, documenting deviations with mission risk rationale. Ref: AFMAN 63-119.
cards.summaryText: Config drift equals vulnerability debt—pay it down daily.
